column2: "Jesus Kraest ne Nyikyerɛ a Nyankopɔn dze maa no dɛ ɔnkyerɛ no nkowaa dza otwar dɛ ɔbɛba ntsɛm; na ɔsomae nam no bɔfoe do dze bɛkyerɛɛ n'akowaa John;"
"ɔno na odzii dase wɔ Nyankopɔn asɛm nye Jesus Kraest dasedzi ho
column3: wɔ ndzɛmba a ohunii nyina ho."
nye hɔn a wotsie nkɔnhyɛnsɛm no
column4: na wɔdze dza wɔakyerɛw no wɔ mu no sie: osiandɛ ber no abɛn."

column2: "John dze kɛma asɔrtɔw esuon a wɔwɔ Asia no: Adom nye asomdwee mfi nyia ɔwɔ hɔ
column4: na ɔreba no; nye esunsum esuon a wɔwɔ n'ahengua no enyim no;"

column2: "nye Jesus Kraest a ɔyɛ dasefo nokwafo
column4: nye asaase do ahemfo hɔn do hwɛdofo no nkyɛn
column6: na ɔdze no bɔgyaa saan hɛn fii hɛn bɔn mu;"

column3: asɔfo ama n'Egya Nyankopɔn no; ɔno na enyimnyam nye tumdzi nka no mbersantsen mfesantsen. Amen."
ɔnam nsuwusiw mu reba; na enyiwa nyina bohu no
column4: mpo hɔn a wɔwɔɔ no peaa no; na wiadze mbusuakuw nyina botwa no ho kwadwom. Dɛmara na ɔbɛyɛ. Amen."

column7: "#Nyi 22.13; Eks 3.14   Emi nye Alfa nye Omega
column10: na menye hom wɔ kyɛfa wɔ Jesus Kraest mu ahohia
column11: nye ahendzi nye abotar no mu no
column12: ɔnam Nyankopɔn n'asɛm nye Jesus Kraest dasedzi ntsi nna mowɔ supruw a wɔfrɛ no Patmos no do."

column2: "Nna mowɔ Sunsum no mu Ewuradze ne da no mu
column3: na metsee m'ekyir ndze kɛse bi
column7: Dza ihu yi kyerɛw no nwoma mu
column8: na soma kɛma asɔrtɔw esuon no; fa kɛma Efeso

column2: "Nna medaan moho dɛ morokɔhwɛ ndze a ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ me no. Na medaan moho no
"na dɛm nkandzeadua esuon no finimfin no muhun obi a ɔtse dɛ nyimpa ba
column3: ɔhyɛ atar wiww ka ne nansa
column4: na ɔdze sika abɔdo abɔ no koko do."

column2: "Na ne tsir nye ne tsinhwi hoa dɛ nguanhwi fitaa
column3: ɔtse dɛ esukwankyɛba; na n'enyiwa tse dɛ gyaframee;"

column2: "na n'anan tse dɛ ayewa a wɔaber ho wɔ fononoo mu na woetwuw ho
column3: na ne ndze tse dɛ esu pii ndze."

column2: "Na okitsa nworaba esuon wɔ ne nsa nyimfa mu
column3: na afona anofanu ndam ndam fi n'anomu. Na no momapɔw tse dɛ ewia a ɔrehyerɛn wɔ n'ahoɔdzen mu."
mohwee n'ananadze dɛ owufo. Naaso ɔdze ne nsa nyimfa too mo do
column6: Emi nye ɔkandzifo nye okyidzifo no

column2: "nye nyia ɔtse ase no; na muwui; na hwɛ
column4: na mikitsa owu nye samanadze nsaafee."
nye dza iyi ekyir ɔbɛba no."

column2: "Nworaba esuon a ihunii wɔ me nsa nyimfa mu nye sikakɔkɔɔ nkandzeadua esuon no ho esumasɛm no nye iyi: nworaba esuon no nye asɔrtɔw esuon no mu abɔfo; na nkandzeadua esuon no so nye asɔrtɔw esuon no."
